title: Provisioning Engine Template Extraction Configuration
description: Defines the configuration to use when extracting a template from a site

persistAssetFiles.description: set to true to persist asset files like logos, thumbnail images, images contained in modern pages, etc.

includeAllClientSidePages.description: set to true to include all client side pages in the template

excludeAuthorInformation.description: set to true to remove author information from webparts and modern clientside pages

includeSiteGroups.description: set to true to include the site groups when extracting site security

includeHiddenLists.description: set to true to include all hidden lists when extracting a template

lists.description: set to define which lists to export

title.description: the title of the list to export

includeItems.description: if set to true list items will be included as datarows in the template

skipEmptyFields.description: if set to true fields with no value will be not be included in the template

camlQuery.description: a CAML query used to limit the list items to export, e.g. <Where><Eq><FieldRef Name='FilterField' /><Value Type='Text'>ValueToFilterOn</Value></Eq></Where>

rowlimit.description: the max numbers of rows to return

viewFields.description: the fields to return in the query

taxonomy.description: define taxonomy / management metadata termstore extraction settings

includeSecurity.description: set to true to include security

removeExistingNodes.description: set to true to mark the navigation to remove the existing nodes when applying the template
set to true to mark the footer navigation to remove the existing nodes when applying the template

handlers.description: set to define which handels to run. If not specified all handlers will be run
